flawed_nl_solution:
The fixer used 30/100*400 = <<30/100*400=4000/3>>4000/3 nails to fix the kitchen.
The number of nails remaining in the container after he fixes the kitchen is 400-4000/3 = <<400-4000/3=-2800/3>>-2800/3
He also uses 70/100*-2800/3 = <<70/100*-2800/3=-1960/3>>-1960/3 of the nails remaining in the container to fix the fence.
The total number of nails which the fixer hasn't used is -2800/3--1960/3 = <<-2800/3--1960/3=-280>>-280

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 120, not 4000/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
